question: Which of the following is a best practice for debugging production issues in your experience as Dev-David?
choices: Checking logs and collecting relevant data
Reviewing code changes and isolating potential causes
Running automated tests and analyzing results
Working with cross-functional teams to identify root causes
Investigating performance issues through profiling and benchmarking
Analyzing usage patterns and identifying trends
Collaborating with other stakeholders to gather insights and understand the issue
Leaning on tools such as automated debugging and testing frameworks
Consulting with subject matter experts for guidance
Conducting user research to identify potential issues
user_answer: Checking logs and collecting relevant data
